name: Invert Ghost
description:
Play with your friend as ghosts and try to capture five souls first!

This ghosts cannot fly or jump but, you can change the gravity for you to catch the soul!

Sprites and art by me (Bruno Gat Car).

This game is the " physics and mathematics for games" class in Universidade Franciscana(UFN) in Santa Maria, RS, Brazil.

The music and sounds were from a free source.

Some in the animation and in the hitboxes could still occurring.

Please, leave your suggestions in the comments!
